name: Welcome Home (DeCain)
description:
Welcome Home is a horror game developed for the brackeys game jam 2022.2.

Plot
You play as a person just coming home from a long holiday, but... No light is working, and you're not alone? Someone or rather something is here with you, is it a friend or is it an enemy?

How To Play

Movement: WASD + mouse.
Interaction: Left Mouse Button.

Guide

Your goal is to switch on every light in the house as light repels this monster. Find the generator switch it on, then turn on a light, then back to the generator. Repeat this process 6 times, then the house is lit, then you'll win.
